item.title: GozMind - My 10 liner for the NOMAM 2014 competition
item.description: Over Christmas break I really started to get back into using my Atari 800xl. I got my MyIDE+Flash set up to work with Action! because I've always wanted to learn it. Then I read about the BASIC Ten-Liners - Contest 2014. I had a snow day today, so I am â€¦
item.dc:creator: gozar
